verses.verse: The beginning <S%G746><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

As it is written <S%G1125><s%> in Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> My messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> Your face, <S%G4383><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> will prepare <S%G2680><s%> Your way; <S%G3598><s%>

The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> 'Make <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> His paths <S%G5147><s%> straight. <S%G2117><s%>' "

John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G907><s%> appeared <S%G1096><s%> in the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> a baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> for the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of Judea <S%G2453><s%> was going <S%G1607><s%> out to him, and all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2415><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%G2415><s%> and they were being baptized <S%G907><s%> by him in the Jordan <S%G2446><s%> River, <S%G4215><s%> confessing <S%G1843><s%> their sins. <S%G266><s%>

And John <S%G2491><s%> was clothed <S%G1746><s%> with camel's hair <S%G2359><s%> and [wore] a leather <S%G1193><s%> belt <S%G2223><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> his waist, <S%G3751><s%> and his diet <S%G2068><s%> was locusts <S%G200><s%> and wild <S%G66><s%> honey. <S%G3192><s%>

And he was preaching, <S%G2784><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "After <S%G3694><s%> me One is coming <S%G2064><s%> who is mightier <S%G2478><s%> than I, and I am <S%G1510><s%> not fit <S%G2425><s%> to stoop <S%G2955><s%> down <S%G2955><s%> and untie <S%G3089><s%> the thong <S%G2438><s%> of His sandals. <S%G5266><s%>
"I baptized <S%G907><s%> you with water; <S%G5204><s%> but He will baptize <S%G907><s%> you with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>"

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> in Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and was baptized <S%G907><s%> by John <S%G2491><s%> in the Jordan. <S%G2446><s%>

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> coming <S%G305><s%> up out of the water, <S%G5204><s%> He saw <S%G3708><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> opening, <S%G4977><s%> and the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> upon Him;
and a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> out of the heavens: <S%G3772><s%> "Thou art <S%G1510><s%> My beloved <S%G27><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> in Thee I am <S%G2106><s%> well-pleased."
And immediately <S%G2117><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> impelled <S%G7057><s%> Him [to go] out into the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

And He was in the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> forty <S%G5065><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> being tempted <S%G3985><s%> by Satan; <S%G4567><s%> and He was with the wild <S%G2342><s%> beasts, <S%G2342><s%> and the angels <S%G32><s%> were ministering <S%G1247><s%> to Him.

And after <S%G3326><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> had been taken <S%G3860><s%> into custody, <S%G3860><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The time <S%G2540><s%> is fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> and the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is at hand; <S%G1448><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> and believe <S%G4100><s%> in the gospel. <S%G2098><s%>"

And as He was going <S%G3855><s%> along <S%G3855><s%> by the Sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> He saw <S%G3708><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> and Andrew, <S%G406><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> of Simon, <S%G4613><s%> casting <S%G7010><s%> a net <S%G7010><s%> in the sea; <S%G2281><s%> for they were fishermen. <S%G231><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Follow <S%G1205><s%> <S%G3694><s%> Me, and I will make <S%G4160><s%> you become <S%G1096><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>"
And they immediately <S%G2117><s%> left <S%G863><s%> the nets <S%G1350><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> Him.

And going <S%G4260><s%> on a little <S%G3641><s%> farther, <S%G4260><s%> He saw <S%G3708><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the [son] of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> who <S%G846><s%> were also <S%G2532><s%> in the boat <S%G4143><s%> mending <S%G2675><s%> the nets. <S%G1350><s%>

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> He called <S%G2564><s%> them; and they left <S%G863><s%> their father <S%G3962><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> in the boat <S%G4143><s%> with the hired <S%G3411><s%> servants, <S%G3411><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> to follow <S%G3694><s%> Him.

And they went <S%G1531><s%> into Capernaum; <S%G2746><s%> and immediately <S%G2117><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> He entered <S%G1525><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> and [began] to teach. <S%G1321><s%>
And they were amazed <S%G1605><s%> at His teaching; <S%G1322><s%> for He was teaching <S%G1321><s%> them as [one] having <S%G2192><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> and not as the scribes. <S%G1122><s%>
And just <S%G2117><s%> then <S%G2117><s%> there was in their synagogue <S%G4864><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> with an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit; <S%G4151><s%> and he cried <S%G349><s%> out,

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do we have to do with You, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3479><s%>? Have You come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us? I know <S%G3609><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> You are â€“ the Holy <S%G40><s%> One <S%G40><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Be quiet, <S%G5392><s%> and come <S%G1831><s%> out of him!"

And throwing <S%G4682><s%> him into convulsions, <S%G4682><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> cried <S%G5455><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> and came <S%G1831><s%> out of him.

And they were all <S%G537><s%> amazed, <S%G2284><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they debated <S%G4802><s%> among themselves, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%>? A new <S%G2537><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%> with authority! <S%G1849><s%> He commands <S%G2004><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and they obey <S%G5219><s%> Him."

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> the news <S%G189><s%> about Him went <S%G1831><s%> out everywhere <S%G3837><s%> into all <S%G3650><s%> the surrounding <S%G4066><s%> district <S%G4066><s%> of Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> after they had come <S%G1831><s%> out of the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> into the house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> and Andrew, <S%G406><s%> with James <S%G2385><s%> and John. <S%G2491><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> Simon's mother-in-law was lying <S%G2621><s%> sick <S%G2621><s%> with a fever; <S%G4445><s%> and immediately <S%G2117><s%> they spoke <S%G3004><s%> to Him about <S%G4012><s%> her.

And He came <S%G4334><s%> to her and raised <S%G1453><s%> her up, taking <S%G2902><s%> her by the hand, <S%G5495><s%> and the fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her, and she waited <S%G1247><s%> on them.

And when evening <S%G3798><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> after <S%G3753><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> had set, <S%G1416><s%> they [began] bringing <S%G5342><s%> to Him all <S%G3956><s%> who were ill <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who were demon-possessed.
And the whole <S%G3650><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> had gathered <S%G1996><s%> at the door. <S%G2374><s%>

And He healed <S%G2323><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> who were ill <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> with various <S%G4164><s%> diseases, <S%G3554><s%> and cast <S%G1544><s%> out many <S%G4183><s%> demons; <S%G1140><s%> and He was not permitting <S%G863><s%> the demons <S%G1140><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they knew <S%G3609><s%> who He was.

And in the early <S%G4404><s%> morning, <S%G4404><s%> while <S%G1773><s%> it was still <S%G3029><s%> dark, <S%G1773><s%> He arose <S%G450><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> out and departed <S%G565><s%> to a lonely <S%G2048><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and was praying <S%G4336><s%> there. <S%G2546><s%>
And Simon <S%G4613><s%> and his companions <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3326><s%> hunted <S%G2614><s%> for Him;
and they found <S%G2147><s%> Him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Everyone <S%G3956><s%> is looking <S%G2212><s%> for You."

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Let us go <S%G71><s%> somewhere <S%G7006><s%> else <S%G7006><s%> to the towns <S%G2969><s%> nearby, <S%G2192><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that I may preach <S%G2784><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> also; <S%G2532><s%> for that is what I came <S%G1831><s%> out for."

And He went <S%G2064><s%> into their synagogues <S%G4864><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> and casting <S%G1544><s%> out the demons. <S%G1140><s%>

And a leper <S%G3015><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Him, beseeching <S%G3870><s%> Him and falling <S%G1120><s%> on his knees <S%G1120><s%> before <S%G1120><s%> Him, and saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "If <S%G1437><s%> You are willing, <S%G2309><s%> You can <S%G1410><s%> make <S%G2511><s%> me clean. <S%G2511><s%>"

And moved <S%G4697><s%> with compassion, <S%G4697><s%> He stretched <S%G1614><s%> out His hand, <S%G5495><s%> and touched <S%G681><s%> him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "I am <S%G2309><s%> willing; <S%G2309><s%> be cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>"
And immediately <S%G2117><s%> the leprosy <S%G3014><s%> left <S%G565><s%> him and he was cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>
And He sternly <S%G1690><s%> warned <S%G1690><s%> him and immediately <S%G2117><s%> sent <S%G1544><s%> him away, <S%G1544><s%>

and He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "See <S%G3708><s%> that you say <S%G3004><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> to anyone; <S%G3367><s%> but go, <S%G5217><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest <S%G2409><s%> and offer <S%G4374><s%> for your cleansing <S%G2512><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded, <S%G4367><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> to them."

But he went <S%G1831><s%> out and began <S%G757><s%> to proclaim <S%G2784><s%> it freely <S%G4183><s%> and to spread <S%G1310><s%> the news <S%G3056><s%> about, <S%G1310><s%> to such <S%G5620><s%> an extent <S%G5620><s%> that Jesus could <S%G1410><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> longer <S%G3371><s%> publicly <S%G5320><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> a city, <S%G4172><s%> but stayed <S%G1510><s%> out in unpopulated <S%G2048><s%> areas; <S%G5117><s%> and they were coming <S%G2064><s%> to Him from everywhere. <S%G3840><s%>
